actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the bone marrow donor program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Bone Marrow Donor Program Reauthorization Act of 1993
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Bone Marrow Donor Program Reauthorization Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide for the terms of office for members of the board of the National Bone Marrow Donor Registry. Modifies Registry functions. Mandates establishment, through grant or contract, of an office of patient advocacy and case management. (Current law requires the Registry to establish a system for patient advocacy.) Authorizes grants and contracts to increase bone marrow donation, including through public education, training individuals in requesting donations, and testing and enrolling marrow donors. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Bone Marrow Donor Program Reauthorization Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the bone marrow donor program, and for other purposes.
